name: Every Shot Counts
description:
You are cannon in numerous levels and the aim of the game is to simply to get the basketball into the net. But it is not as easy as people think it is as because as you progress throughout each stage, it becomes more difficult to get the basketball into the net as there are many obstacles within your way.

You have a number of 5 shots per stage and they reset every 5 seconds. So every shot you take counts.

Do you think you have what it takes to complete the game!?

PLAY NOW!
